data.title: Auto Repair Austin TX
data.meta_description: Lamb’s Tire and Automotive provides quality car and tire repair services in Austin. Stop by for a tune-up, oil change, or AC repair at one of our many locations!
data.text:
If you’re looking for a quality Austin auto repair shop, come to Lamb’s Tire & Automotive. Our team of experienced technicians will have your vehicle running smoothly and back on the road in no time. Plus, we offer competitive rates and coupons for our services. So whether you need a routine tune-up or major repairs, we’re here to help. At Lamb’s, we believe if you take care of your car, it will take care of you.

Your one-stop shop for car repair and tires.

Austin vehicle owners have chosen Lamb’s Tire & Automotive to keep their cars and trucks in good condition and on the road since 1987. Your local Lamb’s Tire store has everything you need, from basic auto repair in Austin, TX such as brake repair, car battery replacement, and oil changes, to more complex mechanical work such as car AC repair and transmission repair. Our mechanics in Austin, TX can help you save on auto repair, too, with regular preventative maintenance services and great deals on our coupons page.

Need new tires or tire repair? We’ve got you covered.

Make Lamb’s Tire & Automotive your headquarters for new tires in Austin. Stop by any Lamb’s tire shop to have our experienced tire technicians recommend the tire that’s right for your vehicle. In addition to new tire sales, we have a full range of tire services, including tire installation, tire balancing, tire rotation, and tire repair. You can even shop for tires online—browse our in-stock tires and compare tire prices and specifications. We carry the top tire brands, including Goodyear, BF Goodrich, Pirelli, Cooper, Michelin, Kelly Tires, and many more.

Your trusted automotive mechanic for more than 30 years.

You can always count on Lamb’s Tire & Automotive for top-quality customer service at any of our neighborhood locations throughout Austin. In every store, our ASE-Certified Master mechanics are dedicated to providing the highest-quality service and tires at a great value. We have state-of-the-art diagnostic and repair equipment, offer nationwide warranty coverage on all of our services, parts, and labor, and only use parts that meet or exceed manufacturers’ specifications.

At every Lamb’s Tire & Automotive location, you’ll find a friendly, professional team of Austin auto repair experts who are glad to answer your questions and make sure you’re satisfied with our service. While we’re completing the servicing of your vehicle, our complimentary beverages and free Wi-Fi are available during your stay.

Free quotes on auto repairs.

Use our convenient online form to request a quote to get an initial estimate on the cost of your repair. Just provide some basic information about your vehicle, plus the issues you’re experiencing or the service you need, to get started. Your neighborhood Lamb’s Tire car repair experts will be able to provide a final, accurate estimate once we’ve inspected your vehicle.

Protect your investment with preventative maintenance.

One of the best ways to avoid the cost of major car repairs is having regularly scheduled maintenance. At Lamb’s Tire & Automotive, our preventative maintenance services are customized to your vehicle and its manufacturer’s recommendations for periodic 30,000-, 60,000-, and 90,000-mile service. Maintenance services may include these services and others that can extend the life of your engine:

Oil and filter change

Fuel filter check and replacement

Tire rotation and tire balancing

Wheel alignment

Tire inspection

Air filter check and replacement

Brake fluid check and flush

Brake pad inspection

Power steering fluid check and flush

Transmission fluid check and flush

Save on new tires or on your next automotive service.

Lamb’s Tire & Automotive always wants to help you save money! That’s why we offer a variety of specials and promotions with discounts on everything from services such as oil changes to new, brand-name tires and manufacturer rebates. These great deals change often, so be sure to keep checking back on our coupons page for our latest ways to save. Just show your coupons on your mobile phone at your nearest Lamb’s Tire location or print them out and bring them in.

Join our rewards program to save even more.

When you make Lamb’s Tire your headquarters for expert auto repairs and great deals on tires, you’ll also enjoy money back towards future purchases when you sign up to become a Lamb’s Tire & Automotive Rewards Card member. Members get these benefits and more:

$10 off your first visit

$5 off your second visit

Points that accrue with every purchase

A free birthday surprise

Bonus offers reserved only for Rewards Card members

Come to Lamb’s Tire for your Texas State car inspections.

Nearly all vehicles in the state must have an annual inspection. All Lamb’s Tire & Automotive locations can conduct comprehensive safety inspections, as well as emissions tests if needed. Contact us to schedule your Texas State car inspection at a Lamb’s Tire location near you.

Lamb’s Tire Credit Card—be ready for the unexpected.

Car trouble doesn’t always let you know it’s coming. To help make sure your household budget isn’t hit with unexpected car repair costs, we offer the exclusive Lamb’s Tire & Automotive VIP CFNA credit card. This special card gives you a dedicated line of credit that you can use anytime to manage repair expenses. It also has no annual fee, low monthly payments, and a quick and easy application process.

Just need some help to finance car repairs? Take advantage of Confident Financial Solutions (CFS) auto repair loans. Apply for loans from $350 to $7,500 in just a few quick steps.

For great savings on tires—available only to cardholders—apply for a Goodyear Credit Card. You’ll enjoy exclusive offers, mail-in rebate offers, 24/7 online account management, and more. Your Goodyear Credit Card can be used at more than 6,000 locations nationwide.

Request your Lamb’s Tire appointment now.

You never have to wait until business hours to request an appointment at Lamb’s Tire & Automotive. Use our convenient online form to schedule an appointment at your neighborhood Lamb’s Tire location. Simply choose a location and the date and time that works for you. We’ll get back in touch to confirm your appointment.

FAQs

What is preventative maintenance?

How do I know if I should have my brakes serviced?

What should I do when a dashboard warning light comes on?

Does the oil filter need to be replaced every time I have my oil changed?

Here at Lamb’s Tire & Automotive, we recommend replacing the oil filter every time the oil is changed, which should be done approximately every 3,000 miles (closer to 5,000 miles if full synthetic oil is used).

Some car manufacturers say that the oil filter only needs to be replaced with every other oil change. But, you have to take into account that the oil filters on most cars today have been downsized from the previously “standard” quart-sized filter to a pint-sized filter. At that capacity, the oil filters in today’s vehicles won’t perform well if you wait until a second oil change.

Every oil change service here at Lamb’s Tire & Automotive includes an oil filter change. Schedule your appointment today for a high-quality oil and filter change, along with a multi-point vehicle inspection.

What’s the purpose of having my tires rotated?

What are the signs that I might need my car’s AC system serviced?

How do I know if I need new tires?
